channel.title: Need help with Mods and admin
channel.description: Hi I need help of make myself a admin its blisterscape please help thanks,nintendo[br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 06:04:27 PM[/size][hr]Post Plase

item.title: Need help with Mods and admin
item.dc:creator: @Tyler1993 Tyler1993
item.description:
@Tyler1993 wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:2, topic:66051”]First post ftw…heres a tut -.-

This tutorial will show you how to add a command to adjust players’ rights. Add this in PlayerHandler.java below the first { :

public int getID(String name) { for(int a = 0; a < players.length; a++) { if(players[a] != null) { if(players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { return a; } } } return -1; }

Then maxe a .txt file and add this

if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("mod") && playerRights >= 2) { String split[] = command.split(" "); int newRights = Integer.parseInt(split[1]); String name = split[2]; int id = server.playerHandler.getID(name); server.playerHandler.players[id].playerRights = newRights; }

-Hope it helps…

100% codefasga creds.[/quote]

thats about the shittiest tut ive every seen i mean if you dont know how to edit rights, wow!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Mods and admin

@pk4pk wrote:

First post ftw…heres a tut -.-

This tutorial will show you how to add a command to adjust players’ rights. Add this in PlayerHandler.java below the first { :

public int getID(String name) { for(int a = 0; a < players.length; a++) { if(players[a] != null) { if(players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { return a; } } } return -1; }

Then maxe a .txt file and add this

if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("mod") && playerRights >= 2) { String split[] = command.split(" "); int newRights = Integer.parseInt(split[1]); String name = split[2]; int id = server.playerHandler.getID(name); server.playerHandler.players[id].playerRights = newRights; }
